original_text:
“I have heard the taunts of Moab
    and the revilings of the Ammonites,
how they have taunted my people
    and made boasts against their territory.
korean_text: 내가 모압의 비방과 암몬 자손이 조롱하는 말을 들었나니 그들이 내 백성을 비방하고 자기들의 경계에 대하여 교만하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I have heard the taunts of Moab
and the revilings of the Ammonites
how they have taunted my people
and made boasts against their territory.
